code: import React from'react';import'../../styles/ProductCard.css';import{useCart}from'../../contexts/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useCart();const handleAddToCart=product=>{addToCart(product);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" \u20B9",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]});};export default ProductCard;
